Package org.cvs.application.services

Interface ApplicationUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationUserServiceImpl
@Service
public interface ApplicationUserService
Provides service operations that can be carried out with application users.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamiko J. Msosa

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ApplicationUser addUser​(ApplicationUser user)
    Adds a new ApplicationUser instance.
    void deleteUser​(java.lang.Long userId)
    Marks a given ApplicationUser instance as deleted in the database.
    ApplicationUser getActiveUser​(java.lang.Long id)
    Fetches a given ApplicationUser instance from the database.
    ApplicationUser getAlwaysByUsername​(java.lang.String userName)
    Fetches a given active ApplicationUser instance from the database by username and returns a default user for auditing publicly accessible resources.
    ApplicationUser getByUsername​(java.lang.String userName)
    Fetches a given active ApplicationUser instance from the database by username.
    java.util.List<ApplicationUser> getUsers()
    Fetches all active ApplicationUser instances from the database.
    java.util.List<ApplicationUser> getUsers​(java.lang.Long portfolioId)
    Fetches all active ApplicationUser instances for a specific portfolio from the database.
    void retireUser​(java.lang.Long userId)
    Marks a given ApplicationUser instance as retired in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      ApplicationUser addUser​(ApplicationUser user)
      Adds a new ApplicationUser instance.
      Parameters:
      user - a new application user instance to be added
      Returns:
      an application user instance that has been added

    • getByUsername

      ApplicationUser getByUsername​(java.lang.String userName) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Fetches a given active ApplicationUser instance from the database by username.
      Parameters:
      userName - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Returns:
      an active application user instance from the database
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException

    • getAlwaysByUsername

      ApplicationUser getAlwaysByUsername​(java.lang.String userName)
      Fetches a given active ApplicationUser instance from the database by username and returns a default user for auditing publicly accessible resources.
      Parameters:
      userName - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Returns:
      an active application user instance from the database

    • getActiveUser

      ApplicationUser getActiveUser​(java.lang.Long id) throws EntryNotFoundException, EntryNotActiveException
      Fetches a given ApplicationUser instance from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Returns:
      an application user instance if found
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException
      EntryNotActiveException

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser​(java.lang.Long userId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Marks a given ApplicationUser instance as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException

    • retireUser

      void retireUser​(java.lang.Long userId) throws EntryNotFoundException
      Marks a given ApplicationUser instance as retired in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - an identifier to be used in the search criteria
      Throws:
      EntryNotFoundException

    • getUsers

      java.util.List<ApplicationUser> getUsers()
      Fetches all active ApplicationUser instances from the database.
      Returns:
      list of active application users from the database

    • getUsers

      java.util.List<ApplicationUser> getUsers​(java.lang.Long portfolioId)
      Fetches all active ApplicationUser instances for a specific portfolio from the database.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the ID of the portfolio to filter users for
      Returns:
      list of active application users from the database
